synopsis:
Music video for the song 365-nichi no Love Song by Japanese singer-songwriter Mayo Okamoto that was featured on BS Fuji's Be Ponkickies (P-kies) program as part of the Be Pon Melody segment (P-kies Melody). The video was animated by Kouji Nanke. It was also posted on Crown Records' YouTube channel a year later to promote Okamoto's eleventh studio album Tomorrow that released March 7, 2012.

[Source: MAL]
